title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
summary: A tragic story of love, wealth, and the American Dream, set in the Roaring Twenties.
notes: The symbolism of the green light is timeless.

author: George Orwell
summary: A chilling portrayal of totalitarianism and mass surveillance.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
summary: Bilbo Baggins embarks on a dangerous quest to reclaim a dwarven kingdom.
notes: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.

title: Meditations
author: Marcus Aurelius
summary: The Stoic emperor's reflections on virtue, resilience, and human nature.
notes: Control your mind, not external events.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
summary: An epic saga of politics, prophecy, and power on the desert planet Arrakis.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
summary: A witty romantic drama exploring manners, morality, and marriage.
